wtp_wtp <- wtp_data %>% 
  select(Q4r1:Q4r6, wt, ot) %>% 
  rename(Work = Q4r1, 
         Shop = Q4r2, 
         School = Q4r3, 
         Public_trans = Q4r4, 
         Family_friend = Q4r5, 
         Hospital = Q4r6) %>% 
  bind_rows(wtp_data %>% 
              select(Q5r1:Q5r6, wt, ot) %>% 
              rename(
                Work = Q5r1,
                Shop = Q5r2,
                School = Q5r3,
                Public_trans = Q5r4,
                Family_friend = Q5r5,
                Hospital = Q5r6)
            ) %>%
  gather(key,value, -wt, -ot) 
  # filter(value > 0)
wtp_wtp %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_density_ridges(aes(x = value, y = key, fill = key, height = ..density..), 
                      scale = 1.2, alpha = .2) + 
  geom_text(data = summarise(group_by(filter(wtp_wtp), key), 
                             lab = round(weighted.mean(value,wt, na.rm=T),1)), 
            aes(x=60, y=key, label=paste0(\Avg: $\"
